name: Robogo
description:
Made by 5 people taking turns developing it further. Check out the video in the top right to see how creating the game went!!

Here's the list of the people that helped make the game:

  • Blid: https://blid.itch.io/
  • Zayther: https://zayther.itch.io/
  • AstroSam: https://astrosam.itch.io/
  • Dorbellprod: https://dorbell.itch.io/
